movie.title: Midnight Cowboy
movie.tagline: For those who have never seen it and those who have never forgotten it.
movie.overview: Joe Buck is a wide-eyed hustler from Texas hoping to score big with wealthy New York City women; he finds a companion in Enrico "Ratso" Rizzo, an ailing swindler with a bum leg and a quixotic fantasy of escaping to Florida.
